Falters at times: The claim may falter in terms of credibility and reliability, as it is based on a thinly sourced Twitter thread and has been rejected by officials at Versailles.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanations for the forest of oak trees at Versailles or the purpose of their planting.
